typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "BridgeRegistry: Only factory can call this function"

arguments.value: BridgeRegistry: Only factory can call this function

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "BridgeRegistry: Only factory can call this function"

documentation.text:
@dev Register a new Export bridge
 @param bridgeAddress The address of the created bridge

@dev Register a new ImportWrapper bridge
 @param bridgeAddress The address of the created bridge

@dev Get all bridges
 @return Array of bridge addresses

@dev Get all assistants
 @return Array of assistant addresses

@dev Get active bridges
 @return Array of active bridge addresses

@dev Get active assistants
 @return Array of active assistant addresses

@dev Get bridge count
 @return Total number of bridges

@dev Get assistant count
 @return Total number of assistants

@dev Deactivate a bridge (only owner)
 @param bridgeAddress The bridge address to deactivate

@dev Reactivate a bridge (only owner)
 @param bridgeAddress The bridge address to reactivate

@dev Deactivate an assistant (only owner)
 @param assistantAddress The assistant address to deactivate

@dev Reactivate an assistant (only owner)
 @param assistantAddress The assistant address to reactivate

devdoc.details: Registry contract to track all bridges and assistants created by factories Provides easy querying and management of bridge instances

returns._0: Array of assistant addresses for the bridge

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params.assistantAddress: The address of the created assistant
params.bridgeAddress: The bridge address this assistant manages
The address of the created bridge

params.assistantAddress: The address of the created assistant
params.bridgeAddress: The bridge address this assistant manages
The address of the created bridge

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: BridgeRegistry
